name: Kochi
fun_fact: Fun fact: Kochi (formerly Cochin) has the oldest European church in India (1503), the oldest synagogue in the Commonwealth (1568), and Chinese fishing nets that have been used for 600 years - all within walking distance of each other!

hero_dishes.name: Kerala Fish Curry (Meen Curry)
hero_dishes.description: Sour and spicy curry with kokum or tamarind, coconut milk, and fresh catch - karimeen (pearl spot) is prized
hero_dishes.origin_story: Kerala's coast provides incredible seafood - this tangy red curry is the state's signature, made in clay pots for depth
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Fort House Restaurant, Kayees Rahmathulla, Dhe Puttu

hero_dishes.name: Appam with Stew
hero_dishes.description: Lacy fermented rice pancake with coconut milk vegetable or meat stew
hero_dishes.origin_story: Syrian Christian specialty of Kerala - the bowl shape catches the creamy stew perfectly
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Kashi Art CafÃ©, Qissa CafÃ©, Kerala Kitchen, any Syrian Christian home

hero_dishes.name: Karimeen Pollichathu
hero_dishes.description: Pearl spot fish marinated in spices, wrapped in banana leaf, and pan-fried
hero_dishes.origin_story: Karimeen is Kerala's state fish, found in the backwaters - pollichathu means 'cooked in banana leaf'
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Grand Hotel, Fort House, backwater houseboats

hero_dishes.name: Puttu and Kadala Curry
hero_dishes.description: Steamed rice and coconut cylinders with black chickpea curry
hero_dishes.origin_story: Classic Kerala breakfast - the cylindrical puttu steamer is found in every Kerala home
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Dhe Puttu (famous for 40+ puttu varieties), local breakfast stalls

signature_drinks.name: Toddy (Kallu)
signature_drinks.description: Fresh coconut palm sap, mildly alcoholic and refreshing
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: At toddy shops (kallu shappu) with spicy fried fish - an authentic local experience

signature_drinks.name: Filter Coffee
signature_drinks.description: South Indian style drip coffee with milk, served in steel tumbler and davara
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: Poured between vessels to cool and froth - the ritual is part of the pleasure
